articles.author: Lallalit Srijandorn
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD gains momentum below $2,040, eyes on the Chinese data - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price (XAU/USD) extends the rally during the early Asian trading hours on Friday.
articles.content:
• Gold price trades in positive territory near $2,035 for the third consecutive day on the weaker USD.
  • The dovish comments from the Federal Reserve (Fed) boost USD-denominated gold.

articles.author: Catherine Ngai
articles.title: Asia Predatory Lending Apps Claim Victims by Offering Easy Money - Bloomberg
articles.description: Authorities and tech companies are in a game of cat and mouse with criminals who use apps to extract sensitive information and money from people looking to borrow.
articles.content: The trouble often starts with social media ads. Get a $500 personal loan in 20 minutes, the ads on Facebook or Instagram say. No documentation needed, just download this app. When prospective borrowe… [+851 chars]
